00016 
00017 package WeBWorK::HTML::OptionList;
00018 use base qw(Exporter);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::HTML::ScrollingRecordList - HTML widget for a textfield with a dropdown list
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 use Carp;
00029 
00030 our @EXPORT    = ();
00031 our @EXPORT_OK = qw(
00032     optionList
00033 );
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 sub optionList {
00038     my ($options, @Records) = @_;
00039     
00040     my %options = (%$options);
00041     # %options must contain:
00042     #  name - name of option list -- use $r->param("$name")
00043     #  request - the WeBWorK::Request object for the current request
00044     # may contain:
00045     #  default - default selection from pop_up list
00046     #  size - number of rows shown in option list
00047     #  multiple - are multiple selections allowed?
00048     
00049     croak "name not found in options" unless exists $options{name};
00050     croak "request not found in options" unless exists $options{request};
00051     my $name = $options{name};
00052     my $r = $options{request};
00053     
00054     my $default = $options{default};
00055     my $size = $options{size};
00056     $size = 1 unless defined $size;
00057     my $multiple = $options{multiple};
00058     $multiple = 0 unless defined $multiple;
00059 
00060     my $value = $r->param($name) || "";
00061     
00062     my @values = ref $options{values} eq "ARRAY" ? @{ $options{values} } : ();
00063     my %labels = ref $options{labels} eq "HASH" ? %{ $options{labels} } : map { $_ => $_ } @values;
00064     
00065     # if someone just sends in the labels parameter, use all of them as values
00066     @values = keys %labels if (%labels and not @values);
00067 
00068 
00069     map { $size = 4 + length if (length) > $size } @values;
00070 
00071     my %textfield_options = (
00072             name => $name,
00073             value => $value,
00074             size => $size,      # we need to calculate this to be the same as the popup_menu
00075     );
00076     
00077     my %popup_options = (
00078             -name => $name,
00079             -values => \@values,
00080             -labels => \%labels,
00081             -default => $default || $r->param($name) || 0,
00082     );  
00083 
00084     return CGI::span({-class=>"OptionList"},
00085         CGI::table({cellpadding => 0, cellspacing => 0, border => 0}, 
00086             CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, CGI::textfield({%textfield_options}))),
00087             CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, CGI::popup_menu({%popup_options}))),
00088         )
00089     );
00090 
00091     return CGI::span({-class=>"OptionList"},
00092         CGI::textfield({
00093             name => $name,
00094             value => $value,
00095             size => $size,      # we need to calculate this to be the same as the popup_menu
00096         }), CGI::br(),
00097         CGI::popup_menu(
00098             -name => $name,
00099             -values => \@values,
00100             -labels => \%labels,
00101             -default => $r->param($name),
00102         ),
00103     );
00104 }
00105 
00106 1;
